snippet: A Florida woman is selling letters to her mother from Louis Armstrong, who she says was her father; she is also releasing a memoir.
abstract: Sharon Preston-Folta, woman who claims to be daughter of jazz trumpeter Louis Armstrong, has gone public with relationship; is selling letters to her mother from Armstrong and releasing a short memoir about her memories of him.
lead_paragraph: A Florida woman is selling letters to her mother from Louis Armstrong, who she says was her father; she is also releasing a memoir.

headline.seo: Sharon Preston-Folta Says She’s Louis Armstrong’s Daughter
headline.main: Woman Declares Louis Armstrong Was Her Father
headline.print_headline: Woman Declares Louis Armstrong Was Her Father
